pageContext.claim: “When you look at us compared to others, when you see how we've taken testing from a broken system that I inherited to having the best tests that anyone has made anywhere in the world -- and other countries are calling us, wanting to use our technology.”
pageContext.analysis: There is no basis for Trump to claim the United States has the "best" test in the world. The German test adopted by most countries certainly did not have the problems that the United States encountered with the CDC-led test.
